name: Eddie Blazonczyk
description: '''Eddie Blazonczyk, Sr.''' (July 12, 1941 – May 21, 2012) was an American [[polka]] musician and founder of the band The Versatones.  He was inducted into the International [[Polka Hall of Fame]] in 1970, and was a 1998 [[National Heritage Fellowship]] recipient. He has been called "one of the most important figures in the creation of the contemporary Polish-American polka sound." He released more than 60 albums.
